long_description: Ideal for fast packing and trail running, the streamlined men's REI Flash Sport 15 Pack can keep you hydrated and your gear stable as you move swiftly along the trail. Contoured to fit close to the body for stability, the pack's side compression straps pull the load tight to your lower back. The stretch-mesh shoulder harness enhances air circulation, moves with you and fits comfortably. Stretch pockets on shoulder straps combine with zip hipbelt pockets to keep necessities accessible. Floating front stash pocket is big enough for a jacket. Hydration-compatible design accepts most reservoirs (sold separately) up to 3 liters; pocket is accessible via an external zip for easy refills. The men's REI Flash Sport 15 Pack has a front clip loop that lets you attach a safety light (sold separately).
